author: cnbc.com
title: Dealer Teamwork Names Adam Gollhofer Sr. Director -- Client Services & Strategy
text:
EDEN PRAIRIE, Minn., Jan. 31, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- As Dealer Teamwork continues to grow, client services becomes more and more of an essential focus for Dealer Teamwork. It is for that reason that Dealer Teamwork has seen fit to increase hires in the client service department. Among the new hires, Dealer Teamwork is pleased to announce industry veteran, Richard Adam Gollhofer, has joined the company as Sr. Director – Client Services & Strategy.
"We are incredibly blessed to have him join our team," said Sean Stapleton, "his experience in both automotive and in digital advertising are going to have a direct impact on the success of this company. They day he was hired, Dealer Teamwork became much stronger."
Adam Gollhofer comes to Dealer Teamwork with over 12 years of full circle experience in Digital Advertising; from sales and strategy, to implementation. From in house advertising departments, local and national agency clients and helping develop go-to-market strategies for start-ups Adam has a broad background which he brings to Dealer Teamwork. His list of premier clients includes companies to the likes of Amazon, Microsoft, Dell and General Motors.
From these experiences, Adam learned that relationships in this industry are incredibly important. His relationship philosophy stems from a consultative role and likes to think of himself as a trusted adviser to his clients, a philosophy he adopted well before it became the industry standard. It is this thinking that is going to directly impact Dealer Teamwork and their current clients.
"My time in Minnesota has been fantastic so far," said Gollhofer. "It's been quite the change for me, coming from the Pacific Northwest, but the opportunity to work hands-on with such a unique and powerful product, the MPOP™ , has made the transition all the easier. Since I've arrived, we have already made progress that excites me, and I look forward to spending more time with the team to determine how I can continue to position Dealer Teamwork and our clients for success."
About Dealer Teamwork:
Dealer Teamwork is a SaaS Company creating first-class solutions for the retail automotive industry. Dealer Teamwork created the automotive industry's first MPOP™, a patented Merchandising, Personalization, and Optimization Platform. The Platform creates a significant competitive advantage for Dealers by distributing their transactional data to more in-market shoppers effectively and efficiently. For more information, please visit DealerTeamwork.com or visit the Dealer Teamwork FAQs .
Dealer Teamwork's headquarters is in Eden Prairie, Minnesota, and services an international customer base from offices in California, Florida, Massachusetts, Michigan, Nevada, New York and Texas.
